content: any single_crochet bpdc in next 2 st ch2 bpdc in next 3 st x 7 ch2 finish off color c 24 bpdc 8 chain-2 space round 4 with color d double_crochet in first double_crochet of any 3 bpdc group fpdc in next st double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next st popcorn in next chain-2 space double_crochet in next st fpdc in next st double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next st x 7 popcorn in next chain-2 space finish off color d 8 popcorn 8 fpdc 24 double_crochet round 5 with color e fpsc in popcorn single_crochet in space between popcorn and double_crochet half_double_crochet in next st v-st in fpdc half_double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st x 8 finish off color e 8 v-st 16 half_double_crochet 16 single_crochet 8 fpsc 2 round 6 with color b 2 double_crochet in first double_crochet of v-st popcorn in chain-1 space 2 double_crochet in second double_crochet of v-st double_crochet in next st dc3tog in next 3 st double_crochet in next st x 8 finish off color b 8 popcorn 48 double_crochet 8 dc3tog round 7 work in closing chain-1 of popcorn pm in middle single_crochet of each 3 single_crochet group with color e 3 single_crochet in popcorn single_crochet in next 7 st the fourth is worked in the dc3tog of round 6 x 8 finish off color e 80 single_crochet work slip_stitch surface crochet into each st around with color c optional picots when working surface crochet slip_stitch into marked single_crochet picot slip_stitch in next single_crochet the third of the 3 single_crochet group round 8 remove markers as you work working behind the surface crochet/picots can be a little tricky with color a single_crochet in middle single_crochet of any 3 single_crochet group skip 2 st v-st in next st skip 1 st wide trv- st in next st skip 1 st v-st in next st skip 2 st single_crochet in next 11 st with the first and eleventh in marked sts x 4 omitting last single_crochet slip_stitch to beg single_crochet do not fasten_off 1 wide trv-st 2 v-st 11 single_crochet per side round 9 ch1 single_crochet in same st ch1 skip 1 st single_crochet in chain-1 space of next v-st halfv-st in space between next double_crochet/treble_crochet v-st ch2 v-st as corner in next chain-2 space halfv-st in space between next treble_crochet/double_crochet single_crochet in next chain- 1 space ch1 skip 1 st single_crochet in next st x 6 around omitting last single_crochet on final repeat finish off color a 2 v-st 2 halfv-st 8 single_crochet 1 chain-2 space 7 chain-1 space per side round 10 this round is worked in rnds 8 and 9 work carefully into sts and sps as noted with color e 2 half_double_crochet ch2 2 half_double_crochet as corner in chain-2 space skip 1 st half_double_crochet in next 3 space/st hdc2tog in next space/st half_double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in skip st of round 8--working in front of round 9 chain-1 x 3 half_double_crochet in next single_crochet popcorn in
